content:
Use Claims Management for Insurance to design modern and efficient experiences for all parties involved in the claims process. 

Learn About Claims Management for Insurance 
Set up claim products, create dynamic first notice of loss intake flows, give claims adjusters a cohesive view of claims and financial data.

Set Up Claim Models 
A claim product model is the foundation of your entire claims process. A well-planned claim model provides flexible options for customers and efficient tools for claims adjusters.

Set Up the Claims Adjuster Workbench 
Give claims adjusters information and tools to efficiently assess and adjudicate claims.

Build Business Processes for Payment Authorizations 
Set limits on how much users can authorize for claim payments, build a workflow that routes payment authorization requests to supervisors.

Work With the Claims Adjuster Workbench 
Claims adjusters have a cohesive view of coverages, claim participants, claim history, and financial data. They can assess and adjudicate claims.

Work With Claims Financials 
Claims adjusters get an overview of claims and related tasks, then dive into individual claim management.
title: Claims Management for Insurance
